detail_desc: Short, sleeveless top in a fine knit with wide shoulder straps, a sweetheart neckline and a drawstring down the front to create a draped effect.
Short-sleeved tops in organic cotton jersey with a round neckline.
Hat in a soft knit with a pompom on the top and earflaps. Fleece lining.
KIDS EXCLUSIVE. Romper suit in soft, organic slub cotton jersey with buttons at the top, an open chest pocket and short sleeves and legs with sewn-in turn-ups.
Thong briefs in microfibre and lace with a low waist, lined gusset, wide sides and string back.
Treggings in stretch corduroy with an adjustable elasticated waist, fake front pockets and real back pockets.
Long-sleeved jumper in soft, fine-knit cashmere with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides.

Sleeveless, calf-length dress in a cool cotton weave with a V-neck, wrapover top with embroidery and wide shoulder straps with pin-tucks. Concealed zip in one side, a seam and wide band with pin-tucks under the bust and a skirt with pleats to create width.
Blouse in a patterned viscose weave with pin-tucks at the top, a gathered yoke at the back and buttons down the front. Long sleeves with elasticated cuffs, and a rounded hem.
5-pocket trousers in cotton corduroy with a regular waist, button fly and slim, straight legs.

Jacket in soft thermal fleece with contrasting colour details. Stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, long raglan sleeves with thumbholes at the cuffs, twisted side seams and a rounded hem. Longer at the back. Unlined.
Loose-fit pull-on trousers in a soft viscose weave with smocking and a decorative bow at the waist. Side pockets and tapered legs with rounded hems.
Long-sleeved tops in organic cotton jersey.
Cigarette trousers in stretch twill with an elasticated waist, fake fly, diagonal side pockets, a fake welt back pocket and ankle-length legs with creases.

Set with a bodysuit and trousers in soft, organic cotton jersey. Bodysuit with a shirt front, collar, sewn-on bow tie, button placket, long sleeves and press-studs at the crotch. Trousers with foldover ribbing at the waist, a fake fly and ribbed hems.
Running tights in fast-drying functional fabric with a wide waistband with a concealed drawstring, and stripes down the sides of the legs. Regular waist.
Jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a V-neck, a visible seam front and back, dropped shoulders and long sleeves. The jumper is made partly from recycled polyester.
Dance shoes in shimmering imitation leather with elastication around the top and faux fur pompoms on the front. Woven cotton linings and soft suede soles.
Short shorts in light sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated drawstring waist and side pockets.
Shorts in washed, stretch denim with worn details and detachable, elasticated braces. Adjustable, elasticated waist, fake fly with a press-stud, fake front pockets and real back pockets.

Outdoor jacket in woven fabric with a double-layered hood, high collar and zip down the front. Padded front and back sections, zipped front pockets and fleece-lined raglan sleeves in sturdy jersey with inset jersey panels down the sides. Longer and gently rounded at the back. Partly lined.
Vest tops in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a rounded hem.
Shorts in checked flannel with covered elastication and a decorative bow at the waist.
Jacket in soft, thermal fleece with a stand-up collar and zip down the front.
Ankle-length jeans in washed, stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and straight legs. Wide waist panel for best fit over the tummy.
Henley top in sturdy, ribbed cotton jersey with a button placket and long sleeves with ribbed cuffs.
Fitted, long-sleeved jersey dress with a deep V-neck, decorative knot at the front and seam at the waist. Lined.
Long-sleeved dress in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with frills down the front, a gathered seam at the waist and a flared skirt. Unlined. The cotton content of the dress is organic.

Ankle-length joggers in woven fabric with an elasticated, drawstring waist, diagonal side pockets and welt back pockets. Legs with creases and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Slim Fit – a fit that is close-fitting at the thighs, knees and ankles to create a fitted silhouette.
Satin-covered Alice band with a glittery appliqué in the shape of a pumpkin on top.

prod_name: CA Hugh Linen shirt TVP R
detail_desc: Shirt in washed linen with a cutaway collar, French front, long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slim Fit – a fit with narrow shoulders and a tapered waist for a fitted silhouette.
Solid colour ties in a grosgrain weave. Width 6.5 cm.
Fine-knit jumper in a soft viscose blend with a round neck, dropped shoulders, long, tapered sleeves and a straight-cut hem with slits in the sides.

Calf-length skirt in soft Tencel™ lyocell denim. High paper bag waist with elastication at the back and pleats and a sewn-in tie belt at the front. Discreet side pockets and covered buttons down the front. Unlined.
Calf-length jersey dress with short sleeves, an elasticated seam at the waist and gently flared skirt with a sewn-in wrapover. Unlined.
Fully lined, waist-high bikini bottoms with gathered seams in the sides for a gentle draped effect and a high cut at the back.
Vest top in soft cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.

High-waisted, ankle-length sports tights in fast-drying functional fabric. Wide panel to hold in and shape the waist containing a concealed key pocket. Sculpting seams at the back that showcase the body’s physique.
Pull-on trousers in twill with adjustable elastication and a drawstring at the waist, fake front pockets, fake back pockets with decorative buttons, and tapered legs.
Top in printed sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined, drawstring hood with a wrapover front. Long sleeves, a kangaroo pocket and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Dress in a cotton weave with broderie anglaise and flounces at the front that continue over the shoulders and down the back. Buttons at the back and a gathered seam at the waist. Lined.
Shirt in a soft weave with a grandad collar, decorative chest pocket with a button and long sleeves with a tab and button and buttoned cuffs. Gently rounded hem.

Padded parka in woven fabric with a soft matt finish. Detachable, pile-lined hood with a faux fur trim, chin guard and a zip down the front. Flap front pockets with a press-stud, elastication at the back of the waist and ribbing containing glittery threads at the cuffs. Lined.
Shirt in softly draping silk with a collar and buttons down the front. Yoke with a pleat at the back, buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.

Short-sleeved shirt in cotton seersucker with buttons down the front and a grandad collar with a contrasting colour inside. Small embroidered detail on the chest, a yoke at the back, and a rounded hem.
Trousers in a stretch weave with a concealed hook-and-eye fastener, zip fly, side and back pockets and straight, tapered legs with creases.
Fine-knit, printed jumper in a soft, marled viscose blend with long sleeves and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Lined bikini top with underwired, moulded, padded cups that lift and shape. Ties at the back of the neck and a metal fastener at the back.
Slim-fit trousers in soft, superstretch twill with a zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets and narrow hems.

Single-breasted jacket in an Italian wool weave with notch lapels, a chest pocket, flap front pockets and three inner pockets, one with a button. Two buttons down the front, decorative buttons at the cuffs and a single back vent. Lined. Slim fit that tapers at the chest and waist, which combined with slightly narrower sleeves creates a fitted silhouette. For matching trousers, look for: 0507864.
Straw hat with a band. Width of brim 8 cm.
Hair elastics with a knot. Width 1.5 cm.
3/4-length leggings in soft organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.

Shirt in a linen and cotton weave with a turn-down collar, classic front and yoke at the back. Long sleeves with adjustable buttoning at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement and a gently tapered waist to create a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
5-pocket, ankle-length trousers in cotton twill with a regular waist, zip fly and button and slim, flared legs with creases and raw-edge hems.
Baby Exclusive. All-in-one suit knitted in soft organic cotton with buttons on one shoulder and at the crotch. Long raglan sleeves and roll edges around the neckline, cuffs and hems.
Pyjama bottoms in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Tube scarf in a soft knit. Width 60 cm, circumference 180 cm.
Short off-the-shoulder top in a textured chiffon weave with narrow elastication and double flounces at the top. Narrow, decorative shoulder straps and short flounced sleeves.
Aviator-style sunglasses with metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Short dress in jersey with narrow shoulder straps that cross at the back and a V-neck with decorative gathers at the front. Lined.
Ankle boots with a concealed hook and loop fastening at the back, faux fur linings and insoles and EVA (ethylene-vinyl acetate) soles.
Microfibre slip with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Round-necked T-shirt in stretch cotton jersey.
Dress in soft, organic cotton jersey with a rounded lace collar, yoke front and back and long sleeves with elastication at the cuffs. Integral bodysuit with press-studs at the crotch.
Long shirt in a soft viscose weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a chest pocket. Long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem with slits in the sides. Slightly longer at the back.

V-neck playsuit in a viscose weave with lace details, a wrapover front with a concealed press-stud at the neckline and 3/4-length trumpet sleeves. Elasticated seam at the waist and short legs with wrapover sides. Unlined.
Sports vest top in fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back. The polyester content of the top is recycled.

Playsuit in an airy weave made from a ramie blend with notch lapels, buttons at the top and open chest pockets. Short sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups, a seam with elastication at the back of the waist, side pockets and decorative buttons below the waist.
Ankle-length trousers in pleated jersey with a sheen. High, elasticated waist and straight, wide legs with raw-edge hems.
V-neck cardigan in a soft, fine-knit cotton and cashmere blend with low dropped shoulders and long sleeves. Detachable tie belt at the waist and wide ribbing at the cuffs and hem. No buttons.
Wrapover blouse in woven fabric with a V-neck, tie belt at the waist and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs.

Short-sleeved shirt in a soft, slightly stretchy cotton weave with a turn-down collar, buttons down the front and small embroidery detail on the chest. Yoke with a hanger at the back, flap chest pockets with a button, and a gently rounded hem.

Straight-cut, calf-length dress in woven fabric with a grandad collar and covered buttons at the top. Detachable tie belt at the waist and long, slightly wider sleeves with covered buttons at the narrow cuffs. Unlined.
Vest tops in soft, ribbed organic cotton jersey with ribbing around the neckline and armholes.
Short, gently fitted dress in a viscose weave with a V-neck and buttons down the front. Short, elasticated puff sleeves. Unlined.
Ballet pumps with a grosgrain trim around the top and elastic strap over the foot. Fabric linings and insoles and rubber soles. (Sizes 0-1 have soft soles.)
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in supersoft, stretch denim with an adjustable elasticated waist, zip fly and button, and narrow hems.
Joggers in stretch cotton twill with a ribbed drawstring waist, fake fly, side pockets and welt back pockets. Slightly lower crotch and tapered legs with ribbed hems.

Tops in soft cotton jersey, one printed and one in a solid colour. Scalloped neckline, a concealed press-stud on one shoulder and short, scallop-trimmed sleeves. Slightly longer and rounded at the back.
